items.sentence: Well, if you aren't going to drink any of this, I'm not either.

I'm glad that I was able to study French with a native speaker.

Tom often forgets to turn off the lights when he leaves a room.
Our neighbors didn't seem to mind all the noise we were making.
With a little more patience, Tom would've been able to do that.

I want to ask Tom what he's been doing, but I know I shouldn't.
